1 # Lib
2 import rospy
3 from threading import Lock
4 
5 # Messages
6 from std_msgs.msg import Empty
7 from niryo_robot_status.msg import RobotStatus
8 
9 # Services
10 from niryo_robot_sound.srv import PlaySound
11 
12 # Command Status
13 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
14 
15 from .sound_database import SoundDatabase
16 from .sound_player import SoundPlayer
17 from .text_to_speech import NiryoTextToSpeech
18 
19 
20 class SoundManager:
21  """
22  Object which configure the sound management on the robot
23  """
24 
25  def __init__(self):
26  # - Init
27  self.__lock = Lock()
28  self.__shutdown = False
29  self.__sound_player = SoundPlayer()
30  self.__sound_database = SoundDatabase()
31  self.__text_to_speech = NiryoTextToSpeech(self, self.__sound_database)
32 
33  self.play_sound(self.__sound_database.wake_up_sound)
34 
35  self.__rpi_overheating = False
36  self.__overheat_timer = None
37  self.__error_sound_delay = rospy.get_param("~error_sound_delay")
38 
39  # - Subscribers
40  self.__robot_status = RobotStatus.BOOTING
41  self.__logs_status = RobotStatus.NONE
42 
43  self.__robot_status_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_status/robot_status',
44  RobotStatus,
45  self.__callback_sub_robot_status)
46  self.__niryo_studio_connection_sub = rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_studio_connection',
47  Empty,
48  self.__callback_niryo_studio)
49 
50  # - Services
51  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot_sound/play', PlaySound, self.__callback_play_sound_user)
52  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot_sound/overlay', PlaySound, self.__callback_overlay_sound)
53 
54  # Set a bool to mention this node is initialized
55  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
56  rospy.loginfo("Sound Interface - Started")
57 
58  rospy.on_shutdown(self.play_shutdown_sound)
59 
60  # - Callbacks
61 
62  def __callback_niryo_studio(self, _):
63  sound = self.__sound_database.connection_sound
64  self.__sound_player.overlay_sound(sound)
65 
66  def __callback_overlay_sound(self, msg):
67  sound = self.__sound_database(msg.sound_name)
68  if sound is None:
69  return CommandStatus.SOUND_FILE_NOT_FOUND, "{} sound not found".format(msg.sound_name)
70  play_process = self.__sound_player.overlay_sound(sound)
71 
72  if msg.wait_end:
73  play_process.wait()
74  return play_process.result, play_process.message
75 
76  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "{} sound play requested with success".format(msg.sound_name)
77 
78  def __callback_play_sound_user(self, msg):
79  return self.play_user_sound(msg.sound_name, msg.start_time_sec, msg.end_time_sec, msg.wait_end)
80 
81  def __callback_sub_robot_status(self, msg):
82  if self.check_shutdown(msg.robot_status):
83  return
84 
85  self.check_overheating(msg.rpi_overheating)
86  self.check_robot_status(msg.robot_status)
87  self.check_log_status(msg.logs_status)
88 
89  def check_shutdown(self, new_robot_status):
90  if self.__robot_status <= RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN or self.__shutdown:
91  return True
92  elif new_robot_status <= RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN:
93  self.__robot_status = new_robot_status
94  rospy.sleep(1.5) # avoid ctrl+c
95  self.play_shutdown_sound()
96  return True
97  return False
98 
99  def check_overheating(self, new_overheating_status):
100  if new_overheating_status != self.__rpi_overheating:
101  self.__rpi_overheating = new_overheating_status
102  if self.__rpi_overheating:
103  sound = self.__sound_database.error_sound
104  self.play_sound(sound)
105  self.__overheat_timer = rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(self.__error_sound_delay),
106  self.__error_sound_callback)
107  return True
108  elif self.__overheat_timer is not None:
109  self.__overheat_timer.shutdown()
110  self.__overheat_timer = None
111  return False
112 
113  def check_robot_status(self, new_robot_status):
114  if self.__robot_status != new_robot_status:
115  last_status = self.__robot_status
116  self.__robot_status = new_robot_status
117 
118  if last_status in [RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS, RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS] \
119  and self.__robot_status not in [RobotStatus.RUNNING_AUTONOMOUS,
120  RobotStatus.LEARNING_MODE_AUTONOMOUS]:
121  self.__sound_player.stop_all()
122 
123  if last_status == RobotStatus.BOOTING and self.__robot_status != RobotStatus.BOOTING:
124  self.__sound_player.stop_current(fade_out=True)
125  self.play_sound(self.__sound_database.robot_ready_sound)
126  return True
127  elif RobotStatus.SHUTDOWN < self.__robot_status <= RobotStatus.USER_PROGRAM_ERROR:
128  self.play_sound(self.__sound_database.error_sound)
129  return True
130  elif new_robot_status == RobotStatus.CALIBRATION_IN_PROGRESS:
131  self.play_sound(self.__sound_database.calibration_sound)
132  return True
133  elif last_status == RobotStatus.LEARNING_TRAJECTORY and \
134  new_robot_status != RobotStatus.LEARNING_TRAJECTORY:
135  self.play_sound(self.__sound_database.learning_trajectory_sound)
136  return True
137  elif new_robot_status == RobotStatus.REBOOT_MOTOR:
138  self.play_sound(self.__sound_database.reboot_sound)
139  return True
140  return False
141 
142  def check_log_status(self, new_logs_status):
143  if self.__logs_status != new_logs_status:
144  self.__logs_status = new_logs_status
145  if self.__logs_status in [RobotStatus.ERROR, RobotStatus.FATAL_ERROR]:
146  self.play_sound(self.__sound_database.error_sound)
147  return True
148  return False
149 
150  def __error_sound_callback(self, _):
151  if self.__rpi_overheating:
152  sound = self.__sound_database.error_sound
153  self.play_sound(sound)
154  elif self.__overheat_timer is not None:
155  self.__overheat_timer.shutdown()
156  self.__overheat_timer = None
157 
158  def play_sound(self, sound, start_time=0, end_time=0, wait=False):
159  player_execution = self.__sound_player(sound, start_time, end_time)
160  if wait:
161  return player_execution.wait()
162 
163  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "{} sound played with success".format(player_execution.name)
164 
165  def play_user_sound(self, sound_name, start_time_sec=0, end_time_sec=0, wait_end=True):
166  sound = self.__sound_database(sound_name)
167  if sound is None:
168  return CommandStatus.SOUND_FILE_NOT_FOUND, "{} sound not found".format(sound_name)
169 
170  return self.play_sound(sound, start_time_sec, end_time_sec, wait=wait_end)
171 
172  def play_shutdown_sound(self):
173  with self.__lock:
174  if not self.__shutdown:
175  self.__shutdown = True
176 
177  if self.__overheat_timer is not None:
178  self.__overheat_timer.shutdown()
179  self.__overheat_timer = None
180 
181  self.__robot_status_sub.unregister()
182 
183  rospy.logdebug("Play shutdown sound")
184  self.__sound_player.overlay_sound(self.__sound_database.sleep_sound).wait()
